ModMetaData.name: Growable Ores - Plasteel
ModMetaData.author: SeptismJustinn
ModMetaData.description:
This mod introduces a "growable" crop to be refined into plasteel. Crops take ~30 days to "grow" and products can be refined at a smelter into usable plasteel.
Tested only on version 1.4 as I am too lazy to check out the older versions that I never play. Created for myself to learn rimworld modding.
